description: Established in honor of UCO alumnus Dale Edward McConathy, recognizes an undergraduate or graduate student in English who displays promise as a writer. Eligibility Requirements Bachelor of Arts Program in English, English/Creative Writing, English Education, or Master of Arts Program in English (any major) Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
